properties.description: Attractive three bedroom semi-detached family home situated within 0.5 miles of Petts Wood station with fast trains to London and within easy walking distance of local shops, schools, bus routes and National Trust woodland. The property comprises; two receptions, fitted 18'9 x 10'1 kitchen/breakfast room and conservatory. The property also benefits from having a utility room and cloakroom. To the first floor there are three bedrooms and a family bathroom with separate WC. Additional features include double glazing, gas central heating and a well presented interior...
properties.location: Petts Wood Road, Petts Wood, Orpington

properties.description:
Presented in excellent decorative order throughout is this two double bedroom, two bathroom, garden flat.
The modern fitted kitchen is open plan to the living room which boasts solid wooden floors and includes integrated appliances including a dishwasher & a washing machine. This large open plan benefits from bi folding doors onto a secluded private courtyard garden. Both bedrooms are double sized, and the family bathroom boasts a matching three piece suite a shower attachment over the bath. There is also a separate wet room. There are walnut doors throughout and wiring for Sky TV/aerial points in the living room/kitchen and both bedrooms.
This apartment being only five years old, is still under a 10 year building guarantee...

Ousefield House, is an attractive Grade II listed building designed by the by the famous York architect Walter Brierley and built in 1899. When restored, this is set to be one of York’s most desirable family homes, situated in a popular and vibrant part of the city, close to the historic centre. The impressive Victorian building offers an appealing symmetrical façade with wooden framed sash windows arranged over three storeys. The property retains many original features including the main staircase, fireplaces, alcoves and coving and boasts eight bedrooms on the first floor and what were five servants’ bedrooms on the floor above. The house is set back from Fulford Road behind a walled garden and turning area to the front of the house
properties.location: Fulford Road, York, North Yorkshire, YO10

properties.description: Dramatic contemporary 6 bedroom home approaching 3,600 square feet, with landscaped gardens, double garage and plentiful parking close to the city and railway station. Accommodation comprises:- Entrance hall, kitchen family room, sitting room, office/snug, 6 bedrooms -2 with en suite facilities, large utility, family bathroom .Oversized double garage/workshop, plentiful parking, landscaped gardens, signifcant detached 'Garden pod/studio' This stunning contemporary home has already become a local landmark and provides signifcant lateral living over 3 floors with delightful landscaped grounds and extensive garaging/secure parking. The property enjoys a commanding position on Tadcaster Road with a large corner plot, approached through electric gates.
properties.location: Tadcaster RD, York, North Yorkshire, YO24

properties.description: A fantastic opportunity to purchase a block of four modern two bedrooms apartments, set amongst some delightful communal gardens and also featuring allocated parking spaces. All the properties are currently let out with tenants in place and offers a total yearly income of approximately £60,900. The impressive apartments feature spacious living accommodation with contemporary kitchens, a bathroom, en-suite and electric central heating. Located just off Green Lane to the north of the city, there is easy access to both the outer ring road and Clifton Moor shopping park. Laid out as two properties on the ground floor and two on the first, the apartments are reached via a secure communal hallway with either a lift or a staircase to access the first floor.
properties.location: Clifton View Apartments, Green Lane, York,

properties.description: THREE BEDROOM PENTHOUSE apartment in this EXCEPTIONAL development within YORK CITY WALLS in a extremely close proximity of YORK RAILWAY STATION. Generous open plan living spaces and full height vista windows enhance the light and airy feel of this apartment with exceptional attention to detail demonstrated throughout. The stylish open plan living kitchen dining room area have been finished to the highest standards with energy efficient, quality integrated Siemens appliances. Silestone solid worktops with matching splashbacks and bespoke silestone topped island units with eye catching pendant lighting adding the finishing touches to this carefully planned dining space leading on to a Juliette balcony over looking Toft Green into York city centre.
properties.location: 58 Kings, Hudson Quarter, Toft Green, York, YO1

properties.description: Mill Mount Lodge is a luxury first floor apartment offering charm and character within a handsome Georgian building offering a mix of traditional with a modern contemporary feel. The property has been designed to create a wonderful well-proportioned and flexible accommodation throughout and is unusually generous in size with over 2552 square feet of living space. The property benefits from having its own access, leading into a wonderful reception hall which would make an ideal study or reception room which in turn leads onto the communal garden. There is a fantastic sized kitchen with integrated appliances and a large dining area, the room benefits from large dual aspect floor to ceiling windows. The rather grand hallway, which is a useful space in itself
properties.location: Mill Mount, York, North Yorkshire, YO24
